core:processNote.core:description:
AllOptionsSelected - should be set to true if: 1.Size selected and all style attributes are selected. 2.No Sizes is available and all style attributes are selected. 3.Size selected and no style attributes are available.
Note. If no Sizes is available and no style attributes are available then AllOptionsSelected should be set to false to be backward compatible.
If there's a colour list then colour must be selected.

core:dataAssignment.fromExpression: maxPrice == null || productPrice.price > maxPrice ? productPrice.price : maxPrice
minPrice == null || productPrice.price < minPrice ? productPrice.price : minPrice
minPrice == null or productPrice.price < minPrice ? skuProduct : productToDisplay
